title.rendered: Meet Bushan Mohan, Director of Studies

content.rendered:
I am Bushan Mohan and I have been appointed as the Director of Studies – Higher Education and am responsible for the delivery and operations of the BNU top-up programmes.
I come to Regent Group from a University where I managed academic programmes and academic aspects of partnerships. I started my career within the mechanical engineering field after which I studied Business and Finance. I have numerous years of experience as programme leader, lecturer and coordinator at University level within a business school. I am enjoying working with the Regent College London and RST teams and looking forward to the challenges of this new venture.
